Desc.entry: Shaolin long-fist kung fu (changchuan) and five animals style (wu xing) plus Five Elements qigong from Chinese trained qualified quigong teacher. Black belt tuition from an award winning Martial Arts Commission registered teacher and coach. Also lion dancing and feng shui. Regular seminars with world famous Chinese master Sifu Yap Leong. Opportunities to compete in forms and freefighting and to participate in Chinese New Year celebrations. Training in traditional Chinese weapons. Also holds regular visits to new year kung fu and lion dance demonstration in London and elsewhere. Free subscriptions to Red Dragon martial arts e-newsletter and opportunities for e-learning.

Pubs.entry: Leaflets, Newsletter, Red Dragon Kung Fu E Newsletter

ContactName.entry: Sifu Peter Allsop M.Ed, BNMA Hons, Chief Instructor
